bullet_points: Access the Git repository (local path or remote URL).
Fetch all commits between the specified version tags or date range.
If using GitHub/GitLab API, authenticate and fetch PR and issue data.
Extract commit messages, authors, dates, and changed files.
Collect associated PR numbers and issue references.
sub_tasks.sub_task: Fetch and parse Git history data from the repository.

bullet_points: If include PRs is enabled, fetch pull request details from GitHub/GitLab API.
Extract PR titles, descriptions, labels, and merge information.
If include issues is enabled, fetch closed issues within the date range.
Link commits to their associated PRs and issues.
Gather contributor information if requested.
sub_tasks.sub_task: Collect pull requests and issues data from repository API.

bullet_points: Analyze commit messages and PR titles to categorize changes.
Categories: Features, Bug Fixes, Technical Improvements, Breaking Changes, Documentation.
Use AI to understand intent if categorization mode is 'auto'.
Use labels if categorization mode is 'labels'.
Use conventional commit format parsing if mode is 'conventional'.
Identify breaking changes by keywords or semver-major labels.
sub_tasks.sub_task: Categorize all commits and PRs into appropriate sections.

bullet_points: Generate a compelling highlight section (2-3 sentences) summarizing the release.
Identify the most significant features and improvements.
Calculate statistics: total commits, PRs merged, issues closed, contributors.
Create user-friendly descriptions for each change item.
Format PR and issue references with links.
sub_tasks.sub_task: Generate highlights, statistics, and user-friendly descriptions.

bullet_points: Structure the release notes with clear sections: Highlights, Features, Bug Fixes, Technical, Breaking Changes.
Format according to selected output format (Markdown, HTML, Changelog.md).
Add proper headings, bullet points, and emphasis.
Include contributor attribution with @mentions.
Add version numbers, dates, and metadata.
Ensure professional and consistent formatting throughout.
sub_tasks.sub_task: Format and structure the final release notes document.
